author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٢٠) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الرُّوحِ ﴾
حَقِّي عَلَيْكَ كَبِيرٌ لا يُنْسَى، وَفَضْلِي بِكَ عَظيمٌ لا يُغْشى، وَحُبِّي فِيكَ مَوْجُودٌ لا يُغَطَّى، وَنُوري لَكَ مَشْهُودٌ لا يَخْفى.
translation:
(20) O SON OF SPIRIT!
My claim on thee is great, it cannot be forgotten. My grace to thee is plenteous, it cannot be veiled. My love has made in thee its home, it cannot be concealed. My light is manifest to thee, it cannot be obscured.
